name: Infernal Garden
description:
STORY

The gardener lived in a time when the word of Jesus spread rapidly and he feared for his safety. In order to protect himself, he began experimenting with creating demonic plants. After many failed attempts, he finally succeeded. He knew that he had found a way to protect himself from Christianity.

And thus, the Infernal Garden was created.

HOW TO PLAY

WASD -  Move

Shift - Plant Seed 

Right Mouse Button - Water Plant

Left Mouse Button - Shoot 

Credits
